task.title: Moving MariaDB services into the master resource pool

taskbody.prereq: To perform this procedure, both master host nodes must have sufficient RAM and CPU resources for services and for the MariaDB services. For more information about the amount of RAM and CPU resources that are required, please contact your representative.
taskbody.context: Use this procedure to move the mariadb-model and mariadb-events services to the master resource pool. If the services are already in the master resource pool, skip this procedure.

step.cmd: Log in to the browser interface.
In the Applications table, click Zenoss.resmgr.
Scroll down to the Services table, and then expand the Infrastructure entry.
In the Service column of the Services table, click mariadb-events.
On the mariadb-events page, click Edit Service.
In the Edit Service dialog box, select master from the list in the Resource Pool ID field.
At the bottom of the Edit Service dialog box, click Save Changes.
On the mariadb-events page, click Restart.
Repeat steps 3-8 for the mariadb-model service.
